    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String nau,
            java.lang.String idu,
            java.util.Calendar reu,
            int ustp)
        User's contructor: Constructs a new User object with the specified attributes.
        Postconditions: A new User object is created with the specified name, ID, registration date, user type, number of books purchased, number of magazines subscribed, and whether or not the user receives advertisements. The purchased products and billings lists are also initialized as empty ArrayLists.
        Parameters:
        nau - A String representing the name of the user.
        idu - A String representing the ID of the user.
        reu - A Calendar representing the registration date of the user.
        ustp - An integer representing the user type, as determined by the menuUserType method.

    • Method Detail

      • menuUserType

        public UserType menuUserType(int op)
        User's type menu: Returns the UserType corresponding to the specified integer value.
        Postconditions:
        The UserType corresponding to the specified integer value is returned.
        Parameters:
        op - An integer representing the user type.
        Returns:
        The UserType corresponding to the specified integer value.

      • searchPurshased

        public BibliographicProduct searchPurshased(BibliographicProduct product)
        Search a bibliographic product acquire: Searches for a purchased BibliographicProduct with the same identifier as the specified BibliographicProduct.
        Postconditions:
        If a purchased BibliographicProduct with the same identifier as the specified BibliographicProduct is found, it is returned.
        Parameters:
        product - The BibliographicProduct to search for.
        Returns:
        The purchased BibliographicProduct with the same identifier as the specified BibliographicProduct, or null if none is found.

      • acquireProducts

        public void acquireProducts(BibliographicProduct product,
                            double price,
                            java.util.Calendar transactionDate)
        Acquire a new product: Acquires a new bibliographic product, creates a new billing, and adds them to the user's list of purchases and billings.
        Parameters:
        product - The bibliographic product to be acquired.
        price - The price of the acquired bibliographic product.
        transactionDate - The date of the transaction when the bibliographic product was acquired.

      • finishSuscription

        public boolean finishSuscription(BibliographicProduct product)
        Finished a magazine's subscription: Removes the given bibliographic product from the list of purchased products.
        Preconditions:
        The given product must be previously purchased.
        Postconditions:
        The given product is removed from the list of purchased products, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        product - The bibliographic product to be removed from the list of purchased products.
        Returns:
        true if the product was successfully removed from the list, false otherwise.

      • productsLibrary

        public java.lang.String productsLibrary()
        Show acquire products: Generates a list of purchased bibliographic products.
        Postconditions:
        A list of purchased bibliographic products is generated.
        Returns:
        A string containing the identifier of each purchased bibliographic product and an "Enter E to exit" message.

      • sumBooks

        public void sumBooks()
        Increases the books purchased: Increases the count of purchased books by 1.
        Postconditions:
        The count of purchased books is incremented by 1.

      • magazinesSubscribedCount

        public void magazinesSubscribedCount()
        Increases the magazines subscribed: Increases the count of subscribed magazines by 1.
        Postconditions:
        The count of subscribed magazines is incremented by 1.

        public int getBooksPurchased()
        Get number of books purchased: Returns the count of purchased books.
        Postconditions:

        Returns:
        An integer representing the count of purchased books.

        public int getMagazinesSubscribed()

        Postconditions:
        The count of subscribed magazines is returned.

      • setAdds

        public void setAdds(boolean add)
        Set a new value of adds: Sets the value of the boolean adds to the given value.
        Postconditions: The value of the boolean adds is set to the given value.
        Parameters:
        add - A boolean representing the new value of the adds field.

      • simulateReading

        public java.lang.String simulateReading(BibliographicProduct product)
        Simulate reading sessions: Simulates a reading session of the given bibliographic product.
        Preconditions:
        A bibliographic product must be passed as a parameter.
        Postconditions:
        A string indicating the start of the reading session is returned.
        Parameters:
        product - A BibliographicProduct object representing the product to be read.
        Returns:
        A string indicating the start of the reading session, or an empty string if the product is not found in the list of purchased products.

      • countSimulateReading

        public java.lang.String countSimulateReading(BibliographicProduct product,
                                             int pag)
        Count the pages of the reading simulation: Counts the pages read during a simulated reading session of the given bibliographic product.
        Preconditions:
        A bibliographic product and a page number must be passed as parameters.
        Postconditions:
        A string indicating the current page being read is returned.
        Parameters:
        product - A BibliographicProduct object representing the product being read.
        pag - An integer representing the current page being read.
        Returns:
        A string indicating the current page being read, or an empty string if the product is not found in the list of purchased products.

      • searchAcquireProduct

        public BibliographicProduct searchAcquireProduct(BibliographicProduct product)
        Search for acquire products: Searches the list of purchased products for a product with the same identifier as the given product.
        Preconditions:
        A bibliographic product must be passed as a parameter.
        Postconditions:
        The first bibliographic product found with the same identifier as the given product is returned.
        Parameters:
        product - A BibliographicProduct object representing the product to search for.
        Returns:
        A BibliographicProduct object with the same identifier as the given product, or null if no matching product is found in the list of purchased products.

      • acquireProuct

        public boolean acquireProuct(BibliographicProduct product)
        Comprobation of user's acquire products: Determines if the given bibliographic product has been purchased by the user.
        Preconditions:
        A bibliographic product must be passed as a parameter.
        Postconditions:
        A boolean indicating whether or not the product has been purchased is returned.
        Parameters:
        product - A BibliographicProduct object representing the product to check for purchase.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether or not the product has been purchased.
